mapper.delete: delete from team_impormember where userid = #{userid} and groupid = #{groupid};
mapper.update: update team_impormember set username = #{username} where userid = #{userid} and groupid = #{groupid}
mapper.insert: insert into team_impormember (userid, username, groupid) values (#{userid},#{username},#{groupid});
mapper.select: select userid from team_impormember where userid = #{userid} and groupid = #{groupid};
